website_summaries.verdict: A staple in the Emerica line, the Indicator Low is an instant classic that skateboarders indeed appreciated. It is a lightweight and reliable skate shoe that delivers terrific board feel and provides excellent traction.   With a vulcanized construction, this skateboarding shoe also offers flexibility and extra durability. Apart from performance, it has a straightforward upper which is fashion-forward enough that can definitely rock one’s style.
pros: Many customers testified that the Emerica Indicator Low delivers enough comfort right out of the box
With a vulcanized construction, this skateboarding shoe offers amazing board feel according to several users
Some testers noted that it is among the best and reliable skate shoes they used
The Indicator Low provides excellent traction for flips and tricks, stated by some skateboarders
Most customers perceived it as a stylish low-top shoe
This sneaker has a sturdy upper that displays no signs of ripping around the ollie area after use as per several users
It is among the affordable Emerica shoes in the market
cons: A few noted that the Emerica Indicator Low runs small
The outsole is not durable, as per a few skaters
They mentioned that it peels after two weeks and loses tread quickly
Several users muttered that it does not have sufficient cushioning
They hoped it had the G6 insole like other Emerica sneakers
Shoelaces broke easily, complained by a few

customer_reviews.title: Gift for son
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted some mellow, plain shoes in black with black soles. Luckily I found these skate shoes which he really likes and are almost always very comfortable. He loves them. Even though I only bought them a year ago, he is already wearing them out. He likes them cuz they go with everything. Mr. simplistic. lol. Excellent quality shoe, Very comfortable. Loveable for him. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Gorski

customer_reviews.title: If you have a wide foot this is possibly not your shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had to order up to get extra width. If you have a wide foot this is possibly not your shoe
customer_reviews.author: JOEMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Emerica's got better products, spend your $ on something else.
customer_reviews.text: Love Emerica, don't love this shoe. My buddy has gotten the high tops version of these shoes twice, both developed a hole on the bottom in the same spot within weeks of use, same thing happened to me with these low tops. Emerica has always put out quality shoes that I've bought and skated in for years, it's just these ones aren't the quality you want or deserve
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lind

customer_reviews.title: Fits similar to converse
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits me like converse. So i ordered half size down. I guessed right. Im normaly 10.5 but 10 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: randy henderson

customer_reviews.title: This are fine but not great
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel fine but don't get as much grip on a board as I get from other shoes I've used. There is a lot of stitch work and that sometimes feel fairly uncomfortable on the inside. They look good though.
customer_reviews.author: Ob

customer_reviews.title: THese are such cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my blue suede shoes. They are such a cool designed shoes and i really think they are some of the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Bit small, bit orange
customer_reviews.text: They’re slightly small, but I think they’ll stretch a little, maybe order a half size up? Also I ordered “Rust” and it’s a bit oranger than the pics.
customer_reviews.author: Floocoo

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size smaller if you are skating in them
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Make sure you get a half size smaller than what you normally wear... that is if you skate. If not, just grab your normal size and know they may feel a little bit big, but they mold to your feet...I promise.
customer_reviews.author: puff daddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, very stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, very stylish and sturdy. I initially bought them in black, now I have the white/gum and am really liking them.
customer_reviews.author: Chiefy

customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Emerica since 95 or 96. Always a quality skate shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Very comfortable. Skate well. White canvas does not clean well, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kyler Brown

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They look good but if you actually skate the sole wears out extremely fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love my kicks . Good fit great price and good quality !
customer_reviews.author: lil moccasin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I like mostly everything and how they fit. I did not like the soft bottom but other then that they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: this is an excellent no-nonsense basic skate shoe
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent no-nonsense basic skate shoe, tough but light weight, good reinforcement around the toes, and just the right amount of cushioned support.
customer_reviews.author: Guymon Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for flip tricks
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable after a few days/weeks, very flat sole with a little flexibility, great protection for flip tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Fielding

customer_reviews.title: First pair of emericas ive ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Ive been wearing these shoes over a month now and i love them.they fit great and are super comfortable.the toecap has been holding up really well skating.will definitely buy emericas again.they do come with some felt on the sole but it wore off after a day or two of skating
customer_reviews.author: Adam taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an 8... fits a little short. Nice looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: felicia foil

product_meta.title: Emerica Indicator Low Mens Trainers
product_meta.description: The Mens Indicator Low from Emerica combines a Canvas upper with a durable Rubber sole. These Trainers feature Lace-up fastening, cushioned insole and Textile lining. Finished with Emerica branding, the style 6101000102-104 comes in a White Gum colourway.
